Experience.desc1: 2023/2024: Analyst Programmer for the client Hermes

Approach.cardDesc1: We'll collaborate to map out your website's goals, target audience, and key functionalities. We'll discuss things like site structure, navigation and requirements.
Approach.cardDesc2: Once we agree on the plan, I dive into coding. From initial sketches to polished code, I keep you updated every step of the way.
Approach.cardDesc3: Once the project has been developed, we will proceed to testing and production deployment.

Footer.h1-2: digital presence to the next level?
Footer.p: Reach out to me today and let's discuss how I can help you achieve your goals
